page.title: 02General Description
page.content: A great deal of this area is rough farm grazing and there are many small farms.The block lies in part of the {Somerset Levels,}an ancient peat marsh which is over{6000 years}old!The peat has a great ability to preserve most things and so the area is well used by archaeologists_especially famous is the{Sweet Track.}Shapwick village is included with its collection of fine old houses.The village school has recently closed(end of 1984).Apart from the peat works(Fisons) and the rough grazing, there is also a great deal of haymaking in the area.The narrow lanes are often busy with the huge combines which annually arrive to work in the fields. Also of interest is the {Shapwick Heath Nature Reserve,}a large protected area used to develop and study wildlife.
